ALL ARE OF CHRISTIAN EXTRACTION, WITH{86%}HAVING BEEN{BAPTIZED}THOUGH{<5% REGULARLY {ATTEND}SUNDAY SERVICES. SOME ROMAN CATHOLIC FAMILIES TRAVEL OUTSIDE THE AREA TO A CHURCH OF THEIR OWN DENOMINATION. 50% OF FAMILIES ARE REPRESENTED ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS 17% OF FAMILIES ATTEND AT THE MAJOR CHURCH FESTIVALS, (CHRISTMAS, EASTER AND HARVEST).
